mapper.sql: id, seller_id, seller_name, domain_id, principal_name, sale_scope, tel_num, pictures_url, certificate, feature, examine_mes, type, statues, reviewer_id, gmt_created, gmt_modified,merchant_category_id,is_direct_sale
mapper.select:
select
from examine_detail where seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into examine_detail (id, seller_id, seller_name, domain_id, principal_name, sale_scope, tel_num, pictures_url, certificate, feature, examine_mes, type, statues, reviewer_id, gmt_created, gmt_modified,is_direct_sale,merchant_category_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picturesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineMes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statues,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reviewerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{isDirectSale,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{merchantCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
